resources.string: The Tia Foundation Survey
Thank you for participating in this survey. All information is private and anonymous.
Family Health History:
Quality of Life:
Answer here
Save and Export
Sorry, but the app doesn\'t have access to export the spreadsheet.
Survey saved.
Please, fill in all the entries.
Exported spreadsheet.
Sorry, but there was an error exporting the spreadsheet.
Name of neighborhood or community in which you live:
Name of the person being interviewed:
Sex:
Age:
1. What is your job?
2. How long does it take you to get to work?
3. Do you have health insurance? If so, please specify which one:
4. How many times have you been to your doctor this year?
5. How many times have you been to your doctor last year?
6. How long does it take to travel to a medical consultation (non-emergency)?
7. What kind of medical care is available in your community?
Is it available every day?
8. Is everyone in your house up to date on their vaccinations?
9. How many people live in your house?
10. How many pregnancies have you had?
11. How many were born alive?
12. Do you use a method of pregnancy prevention?
13. Has a newborn died in the last two years from lack of care in the last 2 years?
14. Where did you deliver your last baby?
15. How long does it take to reach the hospital in an emergency?
16. Have you been diagnosed with a chronic illness? Like:
How long has it been since your diagnosis?
17. Do you take your medication every day?
18. If you do not take your medication, what is the reason?
19. When you are sick, do you go to the doctor?
20. What kind of medicine do you prefer?
21. Does anyone in the family have a mental illness?
22. Is there anyone in you know who is a victim of domestic violence? This survey is completely anonymous. We assign numbers and community names to our surveys, but not names of people.
¿Who? (mom, dad, sister, brother, son, daughter, nephew, piece, grandpa, grandma)
23. What is the main religion in your home?
24. How often does your family wash their hands in a day?
25. How often does your family brush their teeth?
26. How many times a week does your family bathe?
27. Have you received training, talks or courses on diseases, prevention and management of these?
28. What are the biggest problems in your life?
29. What organizations or individuals do you think could help solve these problems in your community?
30. How many people in this household currently work in the United States? (Everything is anonymous and we will not report to anyone.)
31. What type of work did they do in the United States?
32. ¿How many people in this house plan to travel to the United States to look for work next year?
33. Do you rent or own your home and/or land?
34. How many times does your family eat meat in a week?
35. How many times does your family eat eggs in a week?
36. How many times does your family consume dairy (cheese/milk/cream) in a week?
37. How many times does your family consume fruit in a week?
38. How many times does your family eat corn, tortillas, beans in a week?
39. Do the children in this family currently go to school?
40. What is the highest level of study that you can achieve at the local schools?
41. How far away is the nearest middle school?
42. How far away is the nearest high school?
43 What material is the floor of your house made of?
44. What material is your house made of?
45. Do you have electricity in your home?
46. Wha kind of bathroom do you have?
47. Where do you get your drinking water?
48. For the interviewer: do you have a notes?
